ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION

block.text: REVELATION

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 1
This is the Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things which must happen soon, which he sent and made known by his angel to his servant, John.

block.text: Bu, İsa Mәsihin vәhyidir. Allah bunu Ona verdi ki, tezliklә baş vermәli hadisәlәri Öz qullarına aşkar etsin. Mәsih dә bunu Öz mәlәyi vasitәsilә qulu Yәhyaya göndәrәrәk bәyan etdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: John testified to God’s word, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, about everything that he saw.

block.text: Yәhya Allahın kәlamı vә İsa Mәsihin şәhadәti, yәni gördüyü hәr şey barәdә şәhadәt etdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed is he who reads and those who hear the words of the prophecy, and keep the things that are written in it, for the time is at hand.

block.text: Nә bәxtiyardır bu peyğәmbәrlik sözlәrini oxuyan, eşidәnlәr vә orada yazılanlara riayәt edәnlәr! Çünki vaxt yaxındır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;

block.text: John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;

ReferenceBlocks.text: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who loves us, and washed us from our sins by his blood;

block.text: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who loves us, and washed us from our sins by his blood;

ReferenceBlocks.text: He made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: He made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, he is coming with the clouds, and every eye will see him, including those who pierced him. All the tribes of the earth will mourn over him. Even so, Amen.

block.text: Budur, O, buludlarla gәlir! Hәr göz Onu görәcәk, Hәtta Onun bәdәnini deşәnlәr dә Onu görәcәk. Yer üzünün bütün tayfaları Onun üçün ah-nalә edәcәk. Bәli, belә olacaq. Amin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the Alpha and the Omega, the beginning and the ending,”

block.text: <<Alfa vә Omeqa Mәnәm

ReferenceBlocks.text: says the Lord God,

block.text: Әksinә,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty.”

block.text: << who is, and who was, and who is to come, the Almighty.>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am John, your brother and partner with you in oppression, Kingdom, and perseverance in Christ Jesus. I was on the isle that is called Patmos because of God’s Word and the testimony of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Әziyyәtә, Allahın Padşahlığına vә dözümә sizinlә İsada şәrik olan mәn – qardaşınız Yәhya Allahın kәlamından ötrü vә İsa barәdә şәhadәt etdiyimә görә Patmos adlanan adada idim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord’s day, and I heard behind me a loud voice, like a trumpet
saying,

block.text: Rәbbin günü Ruhun tәsirinә düşdüm. Arxamdan şeypur sәsinә bәnzәr uca bir sәsin belә söylәdiyini
eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I am the Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What you see, write in a book and send to the seven assemblies: to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and to Laodicea.”

block.text: <<Gördüyünü bir kitaba yaz vә bunu yeddi cәmiyyәtә, yәni Efesә, İzmirә, Berqamaya, Tiatiraya, Sarda, Filadelfiyaya vә Laodikeyaya göndәr>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I turned to see the voice that spoke with me. Having turned, I saw seven golden lampstands.

block.text: Onda çevrildim ki, mәnimlә danışanın kim olduğunu görüm. Çevrildikdә yeddi qızıl çıraqdan gördüm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And among the lampstands was one like a son of man, clothed with a robe reaching down to his feet, and with a golden sash around his chest.

block.text: Çıraqdanların arasında uzun cübbә geymiş, sinәsinә qızıl qurşaq bağlamış bәşәr oğluna bәnzәr Biri var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His head and his hair were white as white wool, like snow. His eyes were like a flame of fire.

block.text: Onun başı, saçı yun vә qar kimi ağ, gözlәri isә odlu alov kimi idi;

ReferenceBlocks.text: His feet were like burnished brass, as if it had been refined in a furnace. His voice was like the voice of many waters.

block.text: ayaqları kürәdә xalis olan pardaqlanmış tunc kimi idi, sәsi dә gur suların sәdasına bәnzәyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He had seven stars in his right hand. Out of his mouth proceeded a sharp two-edged sword. His face was like the sun shining at its brightest.

block.text: O, sağ әlindә yeddi ulduz tutmuşdu, ağzından ikiağızlı iti bir qılınc çıxırdı; Onun üzü tam qüvvәsi ilә parlayan günәşә bәnzәyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I saw him, I fell at his feet like a dead man. He laid his right hand on me, saying,

block.text: Mәn Onu gördükdә ölü kimi ayaqlarına düşdüm. O isә sağ әlini mәnim üstümә qoyub dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t be afraid. I am the first and the last,
and the Living one. I was dead, and behold, I am alive forevermore. Amen. I have the keys of Death and of Hades.

block.text: <<Qorxma! Birinci vә Sonuncu Olan,
Diri Olan Mәnәm. Mәn ölmüşdüm, indi isә әbәdi olaraq diriyәm. Ölümün vә ölülәr diyarının açarları Mәndәdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Write therefore the things which you have seen, and the things which are, and the things which will happen hereafter.

block.text: Belәliklә, öz gördüklәrini, indi vә bundan sonra baş verәcәk hadisәlәri yaz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here is the hidden meaning of the seven stars that you see in my right hand, and the seven lamps of gold: the seven stars are the angels of the seven churches, and the seven lamps are the seven churches.”

block.text: Mәnim sağ әlimdә gördüyün yeddi ulduzun vә yeddi qızıl çıraqdanın sirrinә gәlincә, yeddi ulduz yeddi cәmiyyәtin mәlәklәri, yeddi çıraqdan da yeddi cәmiyyәt demәkdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 2
“To the angel of the assembly in Ephesus write: He who holds the seven stars in his right hand, he who walks among the seven golden lampstands says these things:”

block.text: Efesdә olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: i Yeddi ulduzu sağ әlindә Tutan, yeddi qızıl çıraqdanın arasında Gәzәn belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works, and your toil and perseverance, and that you can’t tolerate evil men. You have tested those who call themselves apostles, and they are not, and found them false.

block.text: sәnin әmәllәrindәn, zәhmәtindәn, dözümündәn vә şәr adamlara dözmәdiyindәn xәbәrdaram. Hәvari olmadıqları halda özlәrini hәvari adlandıranları sınaqdan keçirdin vә onların yalançı olduğunu müәyyәn etdin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You have perseverance and have endured for my name’s sake, and have not grown weary.

block.text: Sәn dözümlü oldun, Mәnim adım naminә tab gәtirdin vә yorulmadın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have this against you, that you left your first love.

block.text: Amma sәndәn bir şikayәtim var: әvvәlki mәhәbbәtindәn әl çәkmisәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember therefore from where you have fallen, and repent and do the first works; or else I am coming to you swiftly, and will move your lampstand out of its place, unless you repent.

block.text: Buna görә dә haradan yıxıldığını yadına sal, tövbә et vә әvvәl etdiyin işlәri gör. Әks tәqdirdә, tövbә etmәsәn, yanına gәlib çıraqdanını yerindәn götürәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But this you have, that you hate the works of the Nicolaitans, which I also hate.

block.text: Amma yaxşı ki sәn nikolaçıların әmәllәrinә nifrәt edirsәn; Mәn dә onlara nifrәt edirәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. To him who overcomes I will give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the Paradise of my God.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir. Qalib gәlәnә Allahın cәnnәtindә olan hәyat ağacından yemәyә imkan verәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Smyrna write: The first and the last, who was dead, and has come to life says these things:

block.text: İzmirdә olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: Birinci vә Sonuncu Olan, ölüb yenidәn Dirilәn belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: I know your works, oppression, and your poverty (but you are rich). The blasphemy of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but are a synagogue of Satan.

block.text: sәnin әziyyәtindәn vә yoxsulluğundan xәbәrdaram, amma sәn zәnginsәn. Yәhudi olduqlarını iddia edәnlәrin küfründәn dә xәbәrdaram, amma onlar Yәhudi deyil, Şeytan yığıncağıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be afraid of the things which you are about to suffer. Behold, the devil is about to throw some of you into prison, that you may be tested; and you will have oppression for ten days. Be faithful to death, and I will give you the crown of life.

block.text: Çәkәcәyin әzabdan heç qorxma. Bax iblis aranızdan bәzisini zindana atacaq ki, sınaqdan keçәsiniz. Siz on gün әziyyәt çәkәcәksiniz. Ölüm bahasına olsa da, sadiq qal, Mәn sәnә hәyat tacını verәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. He who overcomes won’t be harmed by the second death.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir. Qalib gәlәn ikinci ölümdәn heç zәrәr görmәyәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Pergamum write: He who has the sharp two-edged sword says these things:”

block.text: Berqamada olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: İkiağızlı iti qılıncı Olan belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works and where you dwell, where Satan’s seat is. You hold firmly to my name, and didn’t deny my faith in the days of Antipas my witness, my faithful one, who was killed among you, where Satan dwells.

block.text: gör harada, Şeytanın taxtı olan yerdә yaşadığın halda Mәnim adıma bağlı qaldığından xәbәrdaram. Barәmdә sәdaqәtlә şәhadәt edәn, aranızda, Şeytanın yaşadığı yerdә öldürülәn Antipanın günlәrindә belә, Mәnә olan imanından imtina etmәdin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have a few things against you, because you have there some who hold the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to throw a stumbling block before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed to idols, and to commit sexual immorality.

block.text: Amma sәndәn bir az şikayәtim var: aranızda Bilamın tәliminә bağlı olanlar var. O, Balaqı öyrәtdi ki, İsrail övladlarını büdrәdәrәk bütlәrә tәqdim olunan qurbanların әtini yemәyә vә әxlaqsızlığa azdırsın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So you also have some who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans, which thing I hate.

block.text: Elәcә dә sәnin içindә nikolaçıların bu cür tәliminә bağlı olanlar var.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Repent therefore, or else I am coming to you quickly, and I will make war against them with the sword of my mouth.

block.text: Buna görә dә tövbә et. Yoxsa tezliklә sәnin yanına gәlib ağzımdan çıxan qılıncla onlarla döyüşәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. To him who overcomes, to him I will give of the hidden manna, and I will give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name written, which no one knows but he who receives it.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir. Qalib gәlәnә Mәn gizli saxlanan mannadan verәcәyәm. Ona bir ağ daş da verәcәyәm ki, üstündә yeni ad yazılıb; bu adı da daşı alandan başqa heç kәs bilmir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Thyatira write: The Son of God, who has his eyes like a flame of fire, and his feet are like burnished brass, says these things:”

block.text: Tiatirada olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: Gözlәri odlu alova, ayaqları da pardaqlanmış tunca bәnzәyәn Allah Oğlu belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works, your love, faith, service, patient endurance, and that your last works are more than the first.

block.text: sәnin әmәllәrindәn, mәhәbbәtindәn, imanından, xidmәtindәn vә dözümündәn xәbәrdaram; son işlәrin dә әvvәlkilәrdәn daha çoxdur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I have this against you, that you tolerate your woman, Jezebel, who calls herself a prophetess. She teaches and seduces my servants to commit sexual immorality, and to eat things sacrificed to idols.

block.text: Amma sәndәn şikayәtim var: sәn özünü peyğәmbәr adlandıran qadın İzevelә imkan verirsәn ki, Mәnim qullarıma әxlaqsızlıq vә bütlәrә tәqdim olunan qurbanların әtini yemәyi öyrәdәrәk onları aldatsın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I gave her time to repent, but she refuses to repent of her sexual immorality.

block.text: Mәn ona möhlәt verdim ki, tövbә etsin, amma әxlaqsızlığından tövbә etmәk istәmir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So I will cast her on a bed of suffering, and I will make those who commit adultery with her suffer intensely, unless they repent of her ways.

block.text: Bax onu xәstәlik yatağına salıram. Onunla zina edәnlәr birgә etdiklәri әmәllәrdәn tövbә etmәsәlәr, onları da böyük әziyyәtә düçar edәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I will strike her children dead. Then all the churches will know that I am he who searches hearts and minds, and I will repay each of you according to your deeds.

block.text: Onun övladlarını azara salıb öldürәcәyәm. Bütün cәmiyyәtlәr dә bilәcәk ki, insanın daxilini vә ürәyini araşdıran Mәnәm vә hәr birinizә әmәllәrinizә görә әvәz verәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to you I say, to the rest who are in Thyatira, as many as don’t have this teaching, who don’t know what some call ‘the deep things of Satan,’ to you I say, I am not putting any other burden on you.

block.text: Amma siz Tiatirada olan digәrlәrinә, yәni bu tәlimi qәbul etmәyәnlәrә vә Şeytanın dәrin sirri adlandırılan şeylәri öyrәnmәyәnlәrә deyirәm: üstünüzә başqa bir yük qoymuram;

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless, hold that which you have firmly until I come.

block.text: ancaq Mәn gәlincәyә qәdәr özünüzdә olana bağlı qalın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who overcomes, and he who keeps my works to the end, to him I will give authority over the nations.

block.text: Qalib gәlәnә vә Mәnim buyurduğum işlәrә sonadәk riayәt edәnә millәtlәr üzәrindә sәlahiyyәt verәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He will rule them with a rod of iron, shattering them like clay pots; as I also have received of my Father:

block.text: “Dәmir әsa ilә onlara ağalıq edәcәk, Saxsı qablar kimi onları çilik-çilik edәcәk”.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and I will give him the morning star.

block.text: Bunu Atamdan necә aldımsa, elәcә dә ona verәcәyәm. Dan ulduzunu da ona verәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 3

“And to the angel of the assembly in Sardis write: He who has the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars says these things: I know your works, that you have a reputation of being alive, but you are dead.

block.text: Sardda olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: Allahın yeddi ruhuna vә yeddi ulduza malik Olan belә deyir: sәnin әmәllәrindәn xәbәrdaram. Adın var ki, guya dirisәn, әslindә isә ölüsәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Wake up, and keep the things that remain, which you were about to throw away, for I have found no works of yours perfected before my God.

block.text: Oyaq ol vә sağ qalıb ölmәk üzrә olan nәyin varsa, onu möhkәmlәndir. Çünki Mәn sәnin әmәllәrinin Allahımın önündә kamil olmadığını gördüm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember therefore how you have received and heard. Keep it, and repent. If therefore you won’t watch, I will come as a thief, and you won’t know what hour I will come upon you.

block.text: Buna görә dә nә aldığını vә nә eşitdiyini yadına sal. Bunlara riayәt et vә tövbә elә. Әgәr oyaq olmasan, bir oğru kimi gәlәcәyәm vә hansı saat sәnin üstünә gәlәcәyimi dә bilmәyәcәksәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless you have a few names in Sardis that did not defile their garments. They will walk with me in white, for they are worthy.

block.text: Amma Sardda, sәnin yanında öz paltarlarını lәkәlәmәyәn bir neçә şәxs dә var. Onlar Mәnimlә birlikdә ağ paltarda gәzәcәklәr, çünki buna layiqdirlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who overcomes will be arrayed in white garments, and I will in no way blot his name out of the book of life, and I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

block.text: Qalib gәlәn hәr kәs dә ağ paltar geyinәcәk. Mәn onun adını hәyat kitabından әsla silmәyәcәyәm, Atamın vә Onun mәlәklәrinin önündә adını iqrar edәcәyәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Philadelphia write: He who is holy, he who is true, he who has the key of David, he who opens and no one can shut, and who shuts and no one opens, says these things:”

block.text: Filadelfiyada olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: Müqәddәs vә Haqq Olan, Davudun açarının Sahibi, açdığını heç kәs bağlamayan, bağladığını heç kәs açmayan belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works (behold, I have set before you an open door, which no one can shut), that you have a little power, and kept my word, and didn’t deny my name.

block.text: sәnin әmәllәrindәn xәbәrdaram. Bax Mәn sәnin üzünә elә bir qapı açmışam ki, heç kәs onu bağlaya bilmәz. Gücün az olduğu halda Mәnim sözümә riayәt etmisәn vә Mәnim adımdan imtina etmәmisәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I give of the synagogue of Satan, of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but lie. Behold, I will make them to come and worship before your feet, and to know that I have loved you.

block.text: İndi isә Şeytan yığıncağından olub Yәhudi olmadıqları halda özlәrini Yәhudi adlandıran yalançıları mәcbur edәcәyәm ki, gәlib sәnin ayaqlarına düşsünlәr vә Mәnim sәni sevdiyimi bilsinlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because you kept my command to endure, I also will keep you from the hour of testing, which is to come on the whole world, to test those who dwell on the earth.

block.text: Dözüm göstәrәrәk Mәnim sözümә riayәt etmisәn. Buna görә Mәn dә sәni yer üzündә yaşayanları sınamaq üçün bütün dünyanın üzәrinә gәlәcәk sınaq zamanından qoruyub saxlayacağam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am coming quickly! Hold firmly that which you have, so that no one takes your crown.

block.text: Tezliklә gәlirәm. Nәyin varsa, ona bağlı qal ki, heç kәs tacını götürmәsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who overcomes, I will make him a pillar in the temple of my God, and he will go out from there no more. I will write on him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, the new Jerusalem, which comes down out of heaven from my God, and my own new name.

block.text: Qalib gәlәni Allahımın mәbәdinә sütun qoyacağam vә bir daha oranı tәrk etmәyәcәk. Onun üzәrinә Allahımın adını, Allahıma mәxsus şәhәrin, yәni göydәn, Allahımın yanından enәn yeni Yerusәlimin adını vә Öz yeni adımı yazacağam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To the angel of the assembly in Laodicea write: The Amen, the Faithful and True Witness, the Head of God’s creation, says these things:”

block.text: Laodikeyada olan cәmiyyәtin mәlәyinә yaz: Amin Olan, sadiq vә etibarlı Şahid, Allahın yaratdıqlarının Mәnşәyi belә deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “I know your works, that you are neither cold nor hot. I wish you were cold or hot.

block.text: sәnin әmәllәrindәn xәbәrdaram. Sәn nә soyuqsan, nә dә isti. Kaş ki ya soyuq ya da isti olaydın!

ReferenceBlocks.text: So, because you are lukewarm, and neither hot nor cold, I will vomit you out of my mouth.

block.text: İndi ki nә isti, nә dә soyuq olub ilıqsan, sәni ağzımdan qaytaracağam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Because you say, ‘I am rich, and have gotten riches, and have need of nothing;’ You don’t know that you are the wretched one, miserable, poor, blind, and naked;

block.text: Çünki deyirsәn: “Varlıyam, zәngin olmuşam vә heç nәyә möhtac deyilәm”. Amma bilmirsәn ki, zәlil, yazıq, yoxsul, kor vә çılpaqsan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I counsel you to buy from me gold refined by fire, that you may become rich; and white garments, that you may clothe yourself, and that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed; and eye salve to anoint your eyes, that you may see.

block.text: Sәnә mәslәhәt görürәm ki, zәngin olmaq üçün Mәndәn od içindә xalis olan qızıl alasan, hәmçinin geyinib çılpaqlığının ayıbını açmamaq üçün ağ paltar alasan, gözlәrinә sürtüb görmәk üçün dә göz mәlhәmi alasan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: As many as I love, I reprove and chasten. Be zealous therefore, and repent.

block.text: Mәn kimi sevirәm, onu mәzәmmәt vә tәrbiyә edirәm. Buna görә dә qeyrәtә gәl vә tövbә et.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, then I will come in to him, and will dine with him, and he with me.

block.text: Bax qapının önündә durub onu döyürәm; kim sәsimi eşidib qapını açsa, onun yanına gәlәcәyәm vә Mәn onunla, o da Mәnimlә birgә şam edәcәyik.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

block.text: Qalib gәlәnә Mәnimlә birgә Öz taxtımda oturmağa imkan verәcәyәm; Mәn dә elәcә qalib gәlib Atamla birgә Onun taxtında oturmuşam.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.”

block.text: Qulağı olan qoy eşitsin ki, Ruh cәmiyyәtlәrә nә deyir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 4
After these things I looked and saw a door opened in heaven, and the first voice that I heard, like a trumpet speaking with me, was one saying,

block.text: Bundan sonra gördüm ki, göyә açılmış bir qapı var. Әvvәlcә mәnimlә danışdığını eşitdiyim, şeypura bәnzәr sәs dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come up here, and I will show you the things which must happen after this.”

block.text: <<Bura qalx. Bundan sonra baş vermәli hadisәlәri sәnә göstәrәcәyәm>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Immediately I was in the Spirit. Behold, there was a throne set in heaven, and one sitting on the throne.

block.text: Elә o an mәn Ruhun tәsirinә düşdüm. Budur, göydә bir taxt qurulub, taxtda da Biri oturub.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the one who sat there looked like a jasper stone and a sardius. There was a rainbow around the throne, like an emerald to look at.

block.text: Oturanın görünüşü yәşәm vә qırmızı әqiq daşına bәnzәyirdi. Taxtın әtrafında da görünüşcә zümrüdә bәnzәyәn göy qurşağı var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Around the throne were twenty-four thrones. On the thrones were twenty-four elders sitting, dressed in white garments, with crowns of gold on their heads.

block.text: Taxtın hәr tәrәfindә daha iyirmi dörd taxt var idi vә onların üstündә ağ paltar geyinmiş, başında qızıl tac olan iyirmi dörd ağsaqqal oturmuşdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Out of the throne proceed lightnings, sounds, and thunders. There were seven lamps of fire burning before his throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.

block.text: Taxtdan şimşәk, uğultu vә göy gurultusu çıxırdı. Taxtın önündә yeddi mәşәl yanırdı; bunlar Allahın yeddi ruhudur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Before the throne was something like a sea of glass,
similar to crystal. In the midst of the throne, and around the throne were four living creatures full of eyes before and behind.

block.text: Taxtın önündә sanki büllura bәnzәyәn şüşә dәniz var idi.
Taxtın әtrafında, hәr dörd yanında önü dә, arxası da gözlәrlә örtülmüş dörd canlı mәxluq var idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first creature was like a lion, and the second creature like a calf. The third creature had a face like a man, and the fourth was like a flying eagle.

block.text: Birinci mәxluq aslana, ikinci mәxluq danaya, üçüncü mәxluqun üzü insan üzünә, dördüncü mәxluq da uçan qartala bәnzәyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The four living creatures, each one of them having six wings, are full of eyes around and within. They have no rest day and night, saying,

block.text: Bu dörd mәxluqdan hәr birinin altı qanadı var idi; mәxluqların hәr tәrәfi, hәtta qanadlarının alt tәrәfi dә gözlәrlә örtülmüşdü. Bu mәxluqlar gecә-gündüz dayanmadan deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God, the Almighty, who was and who is and who is to come!”

block.text: <<Var Olmuş, Var Olan vә Gәlmәli Olan Külli-İxtiyar Rәbb Allah Müqәddәsdir, müqәddәsdir, müqәddәsdir!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the living creatures give glory, honor, and thanks to him who sits on the throne, to him who lives forever and ever,

block.text: Canlı mәxluqlar hәr dәfә taxtda Oturana, әbәdi Yaşayana izzәt vә şәrәf verib şükür edәndә

ReferenceBlocks.text: the twenty-four elders fall down before him who sits on the throne, and worship him who lives forever and ever, and throw their crowns before the throne, saying,

block.text: iyirmi dörd ağsaqqal taxtda Oturanın önündә yerә qapanıb әbәdi Var Olana sәcdә edir vә taclarını taxtın önünә atıb deyirlәr:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Worthy are you, our Lord and God, the Holy One, to receive the glory, the honor, and the power, for you created all things, and because of your desire they existed, and were created!”

block.text: <<Ey bizim Rәbbimiz vә Allahımız! Sәn izzәt, şәrәf vә qüdrәt almağa layiqsәn. Çünki hәr şeyi Sәn yaratdın, Hәr şey Sәnin iradәnlә var olub yarandı>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 5
I saw, in the right hand of him who sat on the throne, a book written inside and outside, sealed shut with seven seals.

block.text: Mәn taxtda Oturanın sağ әlindә bir tumar gördüm ki, onun hәr iki tәrәfi dә yazılmışdı vә yeddi möhürlә möhürlәnmişdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw a mighty angel proclaiming with a loud voice,

block.text: Hәmçinin gördüm ki, qüdrәtli bir mәlәk uca sәslә elan edir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is worthy to open the book, and to break its seals?”

block.text: <<Tumarın möhürlәrini qırmağa vә onu açmağa kim layiqdir?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one in heaven above, or on the earth, or under the earth, was able to open the book, or to look in it.

block.text: Amma nә göydә, nә yer üzündә, nә dә yer altında bir kәs bu tumarı açmağı yaxud onun içinә baxmağı bacarmadı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And I wept much, because no one was found worthy to open the book, or to look in it.

block.text: Mәn çox ağladım, çünki tumarı açmağa yaxud onun içinә baxmağa layiq olan bir kәs tapılmadı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the elders said to me,

block.text: Onda ağsaqqallardan biri mәnә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t weep. Behold, the Lion who is of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has overcome; he who opens the book and its seven seals.”

block.text: <<Ağlama! Budur, Yәhuda qәbilәsindәn olan Aslan, Davudun Kökü qalib gәlib; buna görә dә O, tumarı vә onun yeddi möhürünü aça bilir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw a lamb in the midst of the throne and of the four living creatures, and in the midst of the elders.

block.text: Gördüm ki, taxtla dörd canlı mәxluqun ortasında vә ağsaqqalların arasında bir Quzu dayanıb; O sanki kәsilmiş vәziyyәtdә idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: A Lamb standing, as though it had been slain, having seven horns, and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God, sent out into all the earth.

block.text: Onun yeddi buynuzu vә yeddi gözü var idi ki, bunlar da bütün yer üzünә göndәrilmiş Allahın yeddi ruhudur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he came, and he took it out of the right hand of him who sat on the throne.

block.text: Quzu yaxınlaşıb taxtda Oturanın sağ әlindәn tumarı götürdü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now when he had taken the book, the four living creatures and the twenty-four elders fell down before the Lamb,

block.text: O, tumarı götürdüyü zaman dörd canlı mәxluq vә iyirmi dörd ağsaqqal Quzunun önündә yerә qapandı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: each one having a harp, and golden bowls full of incense, which are the prayers of the saints.

block.text: Hәr birinin әlindә çәng var idi vә buxurla dolu qızıl nimçәlәr tuturdular ki, bunlar müqәddәslәrin dualarıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sang a new song, saying,

block.text: Onlar yeni bir nәğmә oxuyaraq deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “You are worthy to take the book, and to open its seals: for you were killed, and bought us for God with your blood, out of every tribe, language, people, and nation.

block.text: <<Sәn tumarı götürüb Onun möhürlәrini qırmağa layiqsәn. Çünki Sәn kәsildin Vә hәr tayfadan, dildәn, xalqdan vә millәtdәn olanları Allah üçün Öz qanın bahasına satın aldın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You made us kings and priests to our God, and we will reign on earth.”

block.text: Onları Allahımızla birgә Padşahlığa vә kahinliyә şәrik etdin; Onlar da yer üzünә padşahlıq edәcәk>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw, and I heard something like a voice of many angels around the throne. The living creatures, and the elders; and the number of them was ten thousands of ten thousands, and thousands of thousands;

block.text: Taxtın, canlı mәxluqların vә ağsaqqalların әtrafında saysız-hesabsız mәlәk gördüm vә onların sәsini eşitdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: saying with a loud voice,

block.text: Onlar uca sәslә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Worthy is the Lamb who has been killed to receive the power, wealth, wisdom, strength, honor, glory, and blessing!”

block.text: <<Kәsilmiş Quzu Qüdrәti, sәrvәti, hikmәti, qüvvәti, Şәrәfi, izzәti vә alqışı Almağa layiqdir>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard every created thing which is in heaven, on the earth, under the earth, on the sea, and everything in them, saying,

block.text: Hәmçinin mәn göydә, yer üzündә, yer altında, dәnizdә olan bütün mәxluqların vә oralardakı bütün varlıqların belә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “To him who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb be the blessing, the honor, the glory, and the dominion, forever and ever! Amen!”

block.text: <<Taxtda Oturana vә Quzuya әbәdi olaraq Alqış, şәrәf, izzәt vә qüdrәt olsun!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The four living creatures said,

block.text: Dörd canlı mәxluq da deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Amen!”

block.text: <<Amin!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The elders fell down and worshiped him that lives forever.

block.text: Onda ağsaqqallar yerә qapanıb sәcdә etdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 6
I saw that the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures saying, as with a voice of thunder,

block.text: Mәn gördüm ki, Quzu yeddi möhürün birini açdı. Onda dörd canlı mәxluqdan birinin göy gurultusuna bәnzәr sәslә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come and see!”

block.text: <<gәl>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: And behold, a white horse, and he who sat on it had a bow. A crown was given to him, and he came forth conquering, and to conquer.

block.text: Gördüm ki, bir ağ at vә onun belindә oturan atlının әlindә ox-kaman var. Ona bir tac verildi vә bir qalib kimi yola çıxdı ki, qәlәbә qazansın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he opened the second seal, I heard the second living creature saying,

block.text: Quzu ikinci möhürü açanda ikinci canlı mәxluqun dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come!”

block.text: <<gәl>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another came forth, a red horse. To him who sat on it was given power to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another. There was given to him a great sword.

block.text: Onda ayrısı – od rәngindә bir at ortaya çıxdı. Onun belindә oturan atlıya izin verildi ki, yer üzündә sülhü aradan götürsün vә insanlara bir-birini qırdırsın. Atlıya böyük bir qılınc verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature saying,

block.text: Quzu üçüncü möhürü açanda üçüncü canlı mәxluqun dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come and see!”

block.text: <<gәl>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: And behold, a black horse, and he who sat on it had a balance in his hand.

block.text: Gördüm ki, bir qara at vә onun belindә oturan atlının әlindә tәrәzi var.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a voice in the midst of the four living creatures saying,

block.text: Dörd canlı mәxluqun arasından sanki bir sәsin belә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “A quart of wheat for a denarius, and three choenix of barley for a denarius! Don’t damage the oil and the wine!”

block.text: <<Bir xiniks buğda bir dinara, üç xiniks arpa da bir dinaradır; amma zeytun yağına vә şәraba ziyan vurma>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When he opened the fourth seal, I heard the fourth living creature saying,

block.text: Quzu dördüncü möhürü açanda dördüncü canlı mәxluqun dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come and see!”

block.text: <<gәl>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: And behold, a pale horse, and he who sat on it, his name was Death. Hades followed with him. They were given authority over one fourth of the earth to kill with the sword, with famine, with death, and by the wild animals of the earth.

block.text: Gördüm ki, bir solğun rәngdә at var. Onun belindә oturan atlının adı Ölüm idi. Ölülәr diyarı da onun ardınca gedirdi. Onlara yer üzünün dörddә biri üzәrindә sәlahiyyәt verildi ki, qılınc, aclıq, azar vә yer üzündәki vәhşi heyvanlarla insanları qırsınlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then he opened the fifth seal. I saw underneath the altar the souls of those who had been killed for the Word of God, and for the testimony of the Lamb which they had.

block.text: Quzu beşinci möhürü açanda qurbangahın altında Allahın kәlamına vә etdiklәri şәhadәtә görә kәsilәn canları gördüm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Onlar uca sәslә fәryad edirdi:

block.characterId: souls of those killed for word of God

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: souls of those killed for word of God
ReferenceBlocks.text: “How long, Master, the holy and true, until you judge and avenge our blood on those who dwell on the earth?”

block.text: <<Ey müqәddәs vә haqq olan Pәrvәrdigar, nә vaxta kimi mühakimә etmәyib yer üzündә yaşayanlardan qanımızın qisasını almayacaqsan?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: A long white robe was given to each of them. They were told that they should rest yet for a while. To wait until their fellow servants and their brothers, who would also be killed even as they were, should complete their course.

block.text: Onda hәr birinә ağ xalat verilib deyildi ki, özlәri ilә birgә qulluq edәn, onlar kimi öldürülәcәk bacı-qardaşlarının sayı tamam olana qәdәr bir az vaxt da rahat olsunlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw when he opened the sixth seal, and there was a great earthquake. The sun became black as sackcloth made of hair, and the whole moon became as blood.

block.text: Quzu altıncı möhürü açanda gördüm ki, böyük bir zәlzәlә baş verdi. Günәş qıldan toxunan çul kimi qaraldı vә ayın rәngi bütünlüklә qan kimi oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The stars of the sky fell to the earth, like a fig tree dropping its unripe figs when it is shaken by a great wind.

block.text: Göydәki ulduzlar da әncir ağacının güclü külәkdәn sarsılıb kal meyvәlәrini tökdüyü kimi yerә töküldü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sky was removed like a scroll when it is rolled up. Every mountain and island were moved out of their places.

block.text: Göy dә bükülәn tumar kimi çәkilib getdi. Hәr dağ vә ada yerindәn tәrpәndi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The kings of the earth, the princes, the commanding officers, the rich, the strong, and every slave and free person, hid themselves in the caves and in the rocks of the mountains.

block.text: Onda yer üzünün padşahları, böyük adamlar, sәrkәrdәlәr, varlılar, güclülәr, hәr qul vә azad adam mağaralarda vә dağlardakı qayalar arasında gizlәnib

ReferenceBlocks.text: They told the mountains and the rocks,

block.text: dağlara vә qayalara dedilәr:

block.characterId: kings, princes, generals, rich, powerful, slave and free

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: kings, princes, generals, rich, powerful, slave and free
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him who sits on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb.

block.text: <<Üstümüzә qopub düşün vә bizi taxtda Oturanın üzündәn, Quzunun qәzәbindәn gizlәdin.

block.characterId: kings, princes, generals, rich, powerful, slave and free

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: kings, princes, generals, rich, powerful, slave and free
ReferenceBlocks.text: For the great day of his wrath has come; and who is able to stand?”

block.text: Çünki qәzәblәrinin böyük günü gәlib çatdı vә ona qarşı kim dura bilәr?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 7
After this, I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth. They were holding the four winds of the earth, so that no wind would blow on the earth, or on the sea, or on any tree.

block.text: Bundan sonra mәn yer üzünün dörd küncündә dayanan dörd mәlәk gördüm. Onlar yer üzünün dörd külәyini tutmuşdular ki, nә quru, nә dәniz vә nә dә bir ağac üstünә yel әssin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw another angel ascend from the sunrise, having the seal of the living God. He cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to harm the earth and the sea,

block.text: Gündoğan tәrәfdәn qalxan başqa bir mәlәk dә gördüm ki, var olan Allahın möhürünә malik idi. O, uca sәslә quruya vә dәnizә ziyan vurmaq izni verilmiş dörd mәlәyi çağırıb dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Don’t harm the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, until we have sealed the bondservants of our God on their foreheads!”

block.text: <<Biz Allahımızın qullarının alnını möhürlәyәnә qәdәr quruya, dәnizә vә ağaclara ziyan vurmayın>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard the number of those who were sealed, one hundred forty-four thousand, sealed out of every tribe of the children of Israel:

block.text: Möhürlәnmiş şәxslәrin sayını da eşitdim; İsrail övladlarının bütün qәbilәlәrindәn 144,000 nәfәr möhürlәnmişdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Judah were sealed twelve thousand, of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand, of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand,

block.text: Yәhuda qәbilәsindәn 12,000 möhürlәnmiş nәfәr; Ruven qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Qad qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr;

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand, of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand, of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand,

block.text: Aşer qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Naftali qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Menaşşe qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr;

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand, of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand, of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand,

block.text: Şimeon qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Levi qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; İssakar qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr;

ReferenceBlocks.text: of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand, of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand, of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.

block.text: Zevulun qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Yusif qәbilәsindәn 12,000 nәfәr; Binyamin qәbilәsindәn 12,000 möhürlәnmiş nәfәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude, which no man could number, out of every nation and of all tribes, peoples, and languages, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, with palm branches in their hands.

block.text: Bundan sonra mәn gördüm ki, hәr millәtdәn, hәr tayfadan, hәr xalqdan vә hәr dildәn olan, heç kәsin saya bilmәyәcәyi böyük bir kütlә taxtın vә Quzunun önündә dayanıb. Onlar ağ xalat geyinib, әllәrindә xurma budaqları tutublar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They cried with a loud voice, saying,

block.text: Uca sәslә nida edirdilәr:

block.characterId: multitude from all nations, tribes, peoples, languages

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: multitude from all nations, tribes, peoples, languages
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Salvation be to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!”

block.text: <<Xilas taxtda oturan Allahımıza vә Quzuya mәxsusdur!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: All the angels were standing around the throne, the elders, and the four living creatures; and they fell on their faces before his throne, and worshiped God,
saying,

block.text: Bütün mәlәklәr dә taxtın, ağsaqqalların vә dörd canlı mәxluqun әtrafında dayanmışdı. Onlar taxtın önündә üzüstә yerә qapanaraq Allaha sәcdә edib
dedilәr:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and might, be to our God forever and ever! Amen.”

block.text: <<Amin! Allahımıza әbәdi olaraq Alqış, izzәt, hikmәt, şükür, şәrәf, Qüdrәt vә qüvvәt olsun! Amin!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of the elders answered, saying to me,

block.text: Bu arada ağsaqqallardan biri mәndәn soruşdu:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These who are arrayed in white robes, who are they, and from where did they come?”

block.text: <<Ağ xalat geyinmiş bu şәxslәr kimdir vә haradan gәliblәr?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: I told him, “My lord, you know.” He said to me,

block.text: Ona dedim: <<Ağa, bunu sәn bilәrsәn>>.O mәnә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “These are those who came out of the great tribulation. They washed their robes, and made them white in the Lamb’s blood.

block.text: <<Bunlar böyük әziyyәtdәn keçib gәlәnlәrdir. Onlar öz xalatlarını yuyub Quzunun qanı ilә ağartdılar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore they are before the throne of God, they serve him day and night in his temple. He who sits on the throne will spread his tabernacle over them.

block.text: Buna görә dә Onlar Allahın taxtının önündәdir, Gecә-gündüz mәbәdindә Ona ibadәt edirlәr. Taxtda Oturan da Onların üzәrindә mәskәn salacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will never be hungry, neither thirsty any more; neither will the sun beat on them, nor any heat.

block.text: Onlar bir daha nә ac, Nә dә susuz qalacaq, Günәş vә qızmar isti Onları vurmayacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne shepherds them, and leads them to springs of waters of life. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.”

block.text: Çünki taxtın ortasında olan Quzu Onların Çobanı olacaq, Onları hәyat suyunun qaynaqlarına aparacaq, Allah onların bütün göz yaşlarını silәcәk>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 8
When he opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.

block.text: Quzu yeddinci möhürü açanda göydә tәxminәn yarım saat sükut yarandı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw the seven angels who stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.

block.text: Onda mәn Allahın önündә dayanan yeddi mәlәyi gördüm. Onlara yeddi şeypur verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel came and stood over the altar, having a golden censer. Much incense was given to him, that he should add it to the prayers of all the saints on the golden altar which was before the throne.

block.text: Başqa bir mәlәk dә gәlib qurbangahın önündә durdu. Onun әlindә qızıl buxurdan var idi vә ona çoxlu buxur verildi ki, bunu bütün müqәddәslәrin duaları ilә birgә taxtın önündә olan qızıl qurbangahın üstündә tәqdim etsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The smoke of the incense, with the prayers of the saints, went up before God out of the angel’s hand.

block.text: Buxurun tüstüsü müqәddәslәrin duaları ilә birgә mәlәyin әlindәn Allahın önünә yüksәldi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel took the censer, and he filled it with the fire of the altar, and threw it on the earth. There followed thunders, sounds, lightnings, and an earthquake.

block.text: Onda mәlәk buxurdanı götürüb qurbangahdakı odla doldurdu vә onu yer üzünә atdı. Göy gurultusu, uğultu, şimşәk vә zәlzәlә baş verdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seven angels who had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.

block.text: Yeddi şeypuru olan yeddi mәlәk onları çalmağa hazırlaşdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first sounded, and there followed
hail and fire, mixed with blood, and they were thrown to the earth. One third of the earth was burnt up, and one third of the trees were burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.

block.text: Birinci mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda
qanla qarışıq dolu vә od әmәlә gәlib yer üzünә yağdırıldı. Yer üzünün üçdә biri, ağacların üçdә biri vә bütün yaşıl otlar yandırıldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The second angel sounded,
and something like a great burning mountain was thrown into the sea. One third of the sea became blood.

block.text: İkinci mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda
sanki böyük bir dağ odla yanaraq dәnizin içinә atıldı. Dәnizin üçdә biri qana döndü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One third of the living creatures which were in the sea died. One third of the ships were destroyed.

block.text: Dәnizdә olan canlı mәxluqların üçdә biri öldü. Gәmilәrin dә üçdә biri mәhv oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The third angel sounded, and
a great star fell from the sky, burning like a torch, and it fell on one third of the rivers, and on the springs of the waters.

block.text: Üçüncü mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda
göydәn mәşәl kimi yanan böyük bir ulduz enib çayların üçdә birinin vә su qaynaqlarının üstünә düşdü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The name of the star is called “Wormwood.” One third of the waters became wormwood. Many people died from the waters, because they were made bitter.

block.text: O ulduzun adına <<Yovşan>> deyilir. Suların üçdә biri yovşana döndü. Çoxlu adam sulardan öldü, çünki sular acı olmuşdu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The fourth angel sounded, and one third of
the sun was struck, and one third of the moon, and one third of the stars; so that one third of them would be darkened, and the day wouldn't shine for one third of it, and the night in the same way.

block.text: Dördüncü mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda
günәşin, ayın vә ulduzların üçdә biri vuruldu; buna görә dә onların üçdә biri qaraldı. Gündüzün üçdә biri, gecәnin dә elә o qәdәri işıqsız qaldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw, and I heard an angel, flying in mid heaven, saying with a loud voice,

block.text: Onda göyün ortasında uçan bir qartal gördüm vә onun uca sәslә belә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Woe! Woe! Woe for those who dwell on the earth, because of the other voices of the trumpets of the three angels, who are yet to sound!”

block.text: <<Şeypurlarını çalacaq o biri üç mәlәyin şeypur sәslәrindәn yer üzündә yaşayanların vay, vay, vay halına!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 9
The fifth angel sounded, and I saw a
star from the sky which had fallen to the earth. The key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.

block.text: Beşinci mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda mәn
göydәn yerә düşmüş bir ulduz gördüm. Dibsiz dәrinliyә enәn quyunun açarı ona verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He opened the pit of the abyss, and smoke went up out of the pit, like the smoke from a burning furnace. The sun and the air were darkened because of the smoke from the pit.

block.text: O, dibsiz dәrinliyә enәn quyunu açdı vә quyudan iri bir kürәnin tüstüsünә bәnzәr tüstü çıxdı. Günәş vә hava quyudan çıxan tüstüdәn qaraldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then out of the smoke came forth locusts on the earth, and power was given to them, as the scorpions of the earth have power.

block.text: Tüstünün içindәn yer üzünә çәyirtkәlәr çıxdı vә onlara yer üzündәki әqrәblәrin gücü qәdәr güc verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were told that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree, but only those people who don’t have God’s seal on their foreheads.

block.text: Onlara deyildi ki, yer üzündәki otlara, heç bir yaşıllığa, heç bir ağaca deyil, yalnız alınlarında Allahın möhürü olmayan insanlara zәrәr vursunlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They were given power not to kill them, but to torment them for five months. Their torment was like the torment of a scorpion, when it strikes a person.

block.text: Onlara izin verildi ki, insanları öldürmәdәn onlara beş ay işgәncә versinlәr. Onların verdiyi işgәncә әqrәbin insanı sancdığı zaman olan işgәncәyә bәnzәyir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In those days people will seek death, and will in no way find it. They will desire to die, and death will flee from them.

block.text: O günlәrdә insanlar ölüm axtaracaq, amma tapmayacaqlar. Özlәrinә ölüm arzulayacaqlar, amma ölüm onlardan qaçacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The shapes of the locusts were like horses prepared for war. On their heads were something like golden crowns, and their faces were like people’s faces.

block.text: Çәyirtkәlәrin görünüşü döyüşә hazırlanan atlara bәnzәyirdi. Başlarında sanki qızıl tac var idi, üzlәri dә insan üzü kimi idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They had hair like women’s hair, and their teeth were like those of lions.

block.text: Onların qadınlarda olan kimi saçları var idi, dişlәri dә aslan dişlәri kimi idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They had breastplates, like breastplates of iron. The sound of their wings was like the sound of chariots, or of many horses rushing to war.

block.text: Döş zirehlәri dәmir zirehlәr kimi idi. Qanadlarının sәsi döyüşә qaçan çoxlu sayda arabalarla atların sәsinә bәnzәyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have tails like those of scorpions, and stings. In their tails they have power to harm men for five months.

block.text: Onların әqrәb kimi quyruqları vә neştәrlәri var idi. Quyruqlarında elә güclәri var idi ki, insanlara beş ay zәrәr verә bilәrdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have over them as king the angel of the abyss. His name in Hebrew is “Abaddon,” but in Greek, he has the name “Apollyon.”

block.text: Dibsiz dәrinliyin mәlәyi onların üzәrindә padşahlıq edirdi; onun adı ibranicә <<Avaddon>>, yunanca <<Apollion>> idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The first woe is past. Behold, there are still two woes coming after this.

block.text: Birinci bәla ötüb keçdi. Budur, ondan sonra daha iki bәla gәlir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The sixth angel sounded. I heard a voice from the horns of the golden altar which is before God.

block.text: Altıncı mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Onda mәn Allahın önündәki qızıl qurbangahın dörd buynuzundan gәlәn bir sәs eşitdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It said to the sixth angel who had one trumpet,

block.text: Bu sәs şeypuru olan altıncı mәlәyә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Free the four angels who are bound at the great river Euphrates!”

block.text: <<Böyük Fәrat çayının kәnarında bağlanan dörd mәlәyi burax>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The four angels were freed who had been prepared for that hour and day and month and year, so that they might kill one third of mankind.

block.text: Hәmin o saat, o gün, o ay vә o il üçün hazırlanmış dörd mәlәk buraxıldı ki, insanların üçdә birini öldürsün.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The number of the armies of the horsemen was two hundred million. I heard the number of them.

block.text: Atlı qoşunların sayı iki yüz milyon idi; mәn onların sayını eşitdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Thus I saw the horses in the vision, and those who sat on them, having breastplates of fiery red, hyacinth blue, and sulfur yellow; and the heads of lions. Out of their mouths
proceed fire, smoke, and sulfur.

block.text: Mәn görüntüdә atları vә onların belindә oturan atlıları bu cür gördüm: onların od, tünd göy vә kükürd rәngindә döş zirehlәri var idi, atların başı aslan başı kimi idi vә ağızlarından
od, tüstü vә kükürd çıxırdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: By these three plagues were one third of mankind killed: by the fire, the smoke, and the sulfur, which proceeded out of their mouths.

block.text: Bu üç bәladan, yәni onların ağzından çıxan od, tüstü vә kükürddәn insanların üçdә biri hәlak oldu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths, and in their tails. For their tails are like serpents, and have heads, and with them they harm.

block.text: Çünki atların gücü onların ağzında vә quyruğundadır. Onların quyruğu başı olan ilana oxşayır vә atlar bu başlarla da zәrәr vururlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The rest of mankind, who were not killed with these plagues, didn’t repent of the works of their hands, that they wouldn’t worship demons, and the idols of gold, and of silver, and of brass, and of stone, and of wood; which can neither see, nor hear, nor walk.

block.text: Bu bәlalardan hәlak olmayıb sağ qalan adamlar öz әllәri ilә düzәltdiklәri şeylәrdәn dönüb tövbә etmәdilәr. Cinlәrә vә görmәyә, eşitmәyә, yerimәyә qadir olmayan qızıl, gümüş, tunc, daş, taxta bütlәrә sәcdә etmәkdәn әl çәkmәdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn’t repent of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their sexual immorality, nor of their thefts.

block.text: Hәmçinin onlar nә qatilliklәrindәn, nә sehrbazlıqlarından, nә әxlaqsızlıqlarından, nә dә oğurluqlarından tövbә etdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 10
I saw a mighty angel coming down out of the sky, clothed with a cloud. A rainbow was on his head. His face was like the sun,
and his feet like pillars of fire.

block.text: Mәn göydәn enәn başqa bir güclü mәlәyi gördüm. O, buluda bürünmüşdü vә başının üstündә göy qurşağı var idi. Üzü günәşә,
ayaqları da od sütununa bәnzәyirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He had in his hand a little open book. He set his right foot on the sea, and his left on the land.

block.text: Әlindә açılmış kiçik bir tumar var idi. O, sağ ayağını dәnizin üstünә, sol ayağını isә quruya qoydu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He cried with a loud voice, as a lion
roars. When he cried, the seven thunders uttered their voices.

block.text: Aslan
nәriltisinә bәnzәr uca sәslә nida etdi. O nida edәndә yeddi göy gurultusu öz sәsi ilә danışdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the seven thunders sounded, I was about to write; but I heard a voice from the sky saying,

block.text: Yeddi göy gurultusu danışdığı zaman mәn yazmağa hazırlaşırdım ki, göydәn danışan bir sәs eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Seal up the things which the seven thunders said, and don’t write them.”

block.text: <<Yeddi göy gurultusunun söylәdiklәrini möhürlü saxla, onları yazma>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The angel whom I saw standing on the sea and on the land lifted up his right hand to the sky,

block.text: Onda dәnizdә vә quruda dayandığını gördüyüm mәlәk sağ әlini göyә tәrәf qaldırıb

ReferenceBlocks.text: and swore by him who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and the things that are in it, the earth and the things that are in it, and the sea and the things that are in it, saying:

block.text: әbәdi Var Olanın, göyü vә oradakıları, yeri vә oradakıları, dәnizi vә oradakıları Yaradanın adına and içәrәk dedi:

block.characterId: angel standing on sea and land

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel standing on sea and land
ReferenceBlocks.text: “There will be no more delay.

block.text: <<Daha möhlәt verilmәyәcәk,

block.characterId: angel standing on sea and land

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel standing on sea and land
ReferenceBlocks.text: but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he is about to sound, then the mystery of God is finished, as he declared to his servants, the prophets.”

block.text: amma yeddinci mәlәyin şeypur çalacağı günlәr Allahın sirli niyyәti, qulları olan peyğәmbәrlәrә açdığı kimi tam yerinә yetәcәk>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The voice which I heard from heaven, again speaking with me, said,

block.text: Göydәn eşitdiyim sәs yenә dә mәnimlә danışıb belә dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Go, take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who stands on the sea and on the land.”

block.text: <<Get, dәnizdә vә quruda dayanan mәlәyin әlindәki açılmış kiçik tumarı götür>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I went to the angel, telling him to give me the little book. He said to me,

block.text: Mәn dә mәlәyin yanına gedib ona dedim ki, kiçik tumarı mәnә versin. O mәnә dedi:

block.characterId: angel standing on sea and land

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel standing on sea and land
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Take it, and eat it up. It will make your stomach bitter, but in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey.”

block.text: <<Onu götür, ye. O sәnin mәdәndә acı, ağzında isә bal kimi şirin olacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I took the little book out of the angel’s hand, and ate it up. It was as sweet as honey in my mouth. When I had eaten it, my stomach was made bitter.
He told me,

block.text: Mәn tumarı mәlәyin әlindәn götürüb yedim. O, ağzımda bal kimi şirin idi, amma onu yeyәndәn sonra mәdәmdә acılıq oldu.
Mәnә belә dә deyildi:

block.characterId: angel standing on sea and land

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel standing on sea and land
ReferenceBlocks.text: “You must prophesy again over many peoples, nations, languages, and kings.”

block.text: <<Sәn gәrәk yenә dә çoxlu xalq, millәt, dil vә padşah barәdә peyğәmbәrlik edәsәn>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 11
A reed like a rod was given to me. Someone said,

block.text: Mәnә әsaya oxşayan bir qamış verildi vә mәnә deyildi:

block.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)
ReferenceBlocks.text: “Rise, and measure God’s temple, and the altar, and those who worship in it.

block.text: <<Qalx Allahın mәbәdini, qurbangahı ölç vә orada sәcdә edәnlәri say.

block.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)
ReferenceBlocks.text: Leave out the court which is outside of the temple. Don’t measure it, for it has been given to the nations. They will tread the holy city under foot for forty-two months.

block.text: Amma mәbәdin bayır hәyәtini nәzәrә alma vә oranı ölçmә. Çünki ora başqa millәtlәrә verildi vә onlar müqәddәs şәhәri qırx iki ay tapdaq edәcәk.

block.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)

ReferenceBlocks.characterId: angel or messenger (Greek variant: someone speaking to John)
ReferenceBlocks.text: I will give power to my two witnesses, and they will prophesy one thousand two hundred sixty days, clothed in sackcloth.”

block.text: Öz iki şahidimi göndәrәcәyәm ki, çula bürünәrәk hәmin min iki yüz altmış gün әrzindә peyğәmbәrlik etsinlәr>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are the two olive trees and the two lampstands, standing before the Lord of the earth.

block.text: Bunlar yer üzünün Sahibinin önündә dayanan iki zeytun ağacı vә iki çıraqdandır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone desires to harm them,
fire proceeds out of their mouth and devours their enemies. If anyone desires to harm them, he must be killed in this way.

block.text: Әgәr kimsә onlara zәrәr vurmaq istәsә,
ağızlarından od çıxıb düşmәnlәrini yandırıb-yaxır. Belәcә onlara zәrәr vurmaq istәyәn hәr kәs bu cür öldürülmәlidir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These have the power to shut up the sky, that it may not rain during the days of their prophecy.
They have power over the waters, to turn them into blood, and to strike the earth with every plague, as often as they desire.

block.text: Onların göyü bağlamağa ixtiyarı var ki, peyğәmbәrlik etdiklәri günlәr yağış yağmasın.
Hәmçinin onların suları qana döndәrmәyә vә yer üzünә istәdiklәri qәdәr hәr cür bәla gәtirmәyә ixtiyarı var.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When they have finished their testimony, the beast that comes up out of the abyss will make war with them, and overcome them, and kill them.

block.text: Onlar öz şәhadәtlәrini bitirdikdәn sonra dibsiz dәrinlikdәn çıxan vәhşi heyvan onlarla döyüşәcәk vә onları mәğlub edib öldürәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their dead bodies will be in the street of the great city, which spiritually is called Sodom and Egypt, where also their Lord was crucified.

block.text: Cәsәdlәri onların Rәbbinin dә çarmıxa çәkildiyi böyük şәhәrin baş küçәsinә sәrilәcәk; hәmin şәhәr rәmzi olaraq Sodom vә Misir adlanır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From among the peoples, tribes, languages, and nations people will look at their dead bodies for three and a half days, and will not allow their dead bodies to be laid in a tomb.

block.text: Müxtәlif xalqlardan, tayfalardan, dillәrdәn vә millәtlәrdәn olan adamlar üç gün yarım onların cәsәdinә baxacaq vә qәbirә qoyulmasına yol vermәyәcәklәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Those who dwell on the earth rejoice over them, and they will be glad. They will give gifts to one another, because these two prophets tormented those who dwell on the earth.

block.text: Yer üzündә yaşayanlar onların bu halına sevinib bayram edәcәk vә bir-birlәrinә hәdiyyәlәr göndәrәcәk. Çünki bu iki peyğәmbәr yer üzündә yaşayanlara iztirab vermişdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: After the three and a half days,
the breath of life from God entered into them, and they stood on their feet. Great fear fell on those who saw them.

block.text: Lakin hәmin üç gün yarım bitәndә
Allahdan gәlәn hәyat nәfәsi onların içinә girdi vә onlar ayağa qalxdı. Onda onları görәnlәrin canına böyük qorxu düşdü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a loud voice from heaven saying to them,

block.text: O iki peyğәmbәr göydәn onlara

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Come up here!”

block.text: <<Bura qalxın!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: They went up into heaven in the cloud, and their enemies saw them.

block.text: deyәn uca bir sәs eşitdilәr vә buludun içindә göyә qalxdılar. Düşmәnlәri dә onlara baxdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In that day there was a great earthquake, and a tenth of the city fell. Seven thousand people were killed in the earthquake, and the rest were terrified, and gave glory to the God of heaven.

block.text: O saat böyük bir zәlzәlә baş verdi vә şәhәrin onda biri dağıldı. Zәlzәlәdә yeddi min nәfәr hәlak oldu, qalanları isә qorxuya düşüb göydәki Allahı izzәtlәndirdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The second woe is past. Behold, the third woe comes quickly.

block.text: İkinci bәla ötüb keçdi. Budur, tezliklә üçüncü bәla gәlir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The seventh angel sounded, and great voices in heaven followed, saying,

block.text: Yeddinci mәlәk şeypurunu çaldı. Göydә belә deyәn uca sәslәr eşidildi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “The kingdoms of the world have become the Kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ. He will reign forever and ever!”

block.text: <<Rәbbimiz vә Onun Mәsihi Dünya üzәrindә Padşahlığa sahib oldu! O әbәdi olaraq padşahlıq edәcәk!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: The twenty-four elders, who sit on their thrones before God’s throne, fell on their faces and worshiped God,
saying:

block.text: Onda Allahın önündә öz taxtlarında oturan iyirmi dörd ağsaqqal üzüstә yerә qapanıb Allaha sәcdә edәrәk
dedi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “We give you thanks, Lord God, the Almighty, the one who is and who was, and is to come; because you have taken your great power, and reigned.

block.text: <<Ey Var Olan, Var Olmuş Külli-İxtiyar Rәbb Allah, Sәnә şükür edirik! Çünki Öz böyük qüdrәtini alıb Padşahlıq taxtına çıxdın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The nations were angry, and your wrath came, as did the time for the dead to be judged, and to give your bondservants the prophets, their reward, as well as to the saints, and those who fear your name, to the small and the great; and to destroy those who destroy the earth.”

block.text: Millәtlәr qәzәblәndi, Sәnin dә qәzәbinin vaxtı gәldi. Ölülәri mühakimә etmәk, Sәnin qulların olan Peyğәmbәrlәrә, müqәddәslәrә, Sәnin adından qorxanlara, Kiçiklәrә vә böyüklәrә mükafat vermәk, Yer üzünü mәhv edәnlәri Mәhv etmәk vaxtı çatdı>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: God’s temple that is in heaven was opened, and the ark of the Lord’s covenant was seen in his temple. Lightnings, sounds, thunders, an earthquake, and great hail followed.

block.text: Allahın göydәki mәbәdi açıldı vә Onun Әhd sandığı orada zahir oldu. Onda şimşәk, uğultu, göy gurultusu, zәlzәlә vә güclü dolu gәldi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 12
A great sign was seen in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

block.text: Göydә böyük bir әlamәt zahir oldu: günәşi әyninә geyinmiş, ayaqları altında ay vә başında on iki ulduzlu tac olan bir qadın göründü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She was with child. She cried out in pain, laboring to give birth.

block.text: O hamilә idi vә doğmaq üzrә idi, ağrı vә iztirab çәkәrәk qışqırırdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another sign was seen in heaven. Behold, a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on his heads seven crowns.

block.text: Göydә başqa bir әlamәt zahir oldu: yeddi başlı, on buynuzlu, başlarının üstündә dә yeddi kiçik tac olan böyük vә od rәngindә әjdaha göründü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: His tail drew one third of the stars of the sky, and threw them to the earth.

block.text: Onun quyruğu göy ulduzlarının üçdә birini süpürüb yer üzünә atdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The dragon stood before the woman who was about to give birth, so that when she gave birth he might devour her child.

block.text: Әjdaha doğmağa hazırlaşan qadının önündә dayandı ki, qadın doğan kimi onun uşağını udsun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: She gave birth to a son, a male child, who is to rule all the nations with a rod of iron. Her child was caught up to God, and to his throne.

block.text: Qadın bir oğlan uşağı doğdu ki, <<dәmir әsa ilә bütün millәtlәrә ağalıq edәcәk>>.Bu uşaq Allahın vә Onun taxtının yanına qapılıb götürüldü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, that there they may nourish her one thousand two hundred sixty days.

block.text: Qadınsa çölә qaçdı. Orada onun min iki yüz altmış gün bәslәnmәsi üçün Allah tәrәfindәn hazırlanmış yeri var.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There was war in the sky. Michael and his angels made war on the dragon. The dragon and his angels made war.

block.text: Göydә döyüş oldu. Mikael vә onun mәlәklәri әjdaha ilә döyüşdü. Әjdaha vә onun mәlәklәri dә onlarla döyüşdü,

ReferenceBlocks.text: They didn’t prevail, neither was a place found for him any more in heaven.

block.text: amma güclәri çatmadı. Göydә artıq onlara yer qalmadı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The great dragon was thrown down, the old serpent, he who is called the devil and Satan, the deceiver of the whole world. He was thrown down to the earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.

block.text: O böyük әjdaha – iblis vә Şeytan deyilәn, bütün dünyanı aldadan qәdim ilan yer üzünә atıldı, mәlәklәri dә onunla birgә atıldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a loud voice in heaven, saying,

block.text: Mәn göydә uca bir sәsin belә dediyini eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Now the salvation, the power, and the Kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Christ has come; for the accuser of our brothers has been thrown down, who accuses them before our God day and night.

block.text: <<İndi Allahımızın xilası, gücü, Padşahlığı vә Onun Mәsihinin hakimiyyәti hәyata keçdi. Çünki bacı-qardaşlarımızı Allahımızın önündә Gecә-gündüz tәqsirlәndirәn ittihamçı kәnara atıldı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They overcame him because of the Lamb’s blood, and because of the word of their testimony. They didn’t love their life, even to death.

block.text: Onlar Quzunun qanı vә öz şәhadәt sözlәri vasitәsilә Ona qalib gәldilәr. Hәtta ölümlә üzbәüz olanda da Öz canlarını sevmәdilәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore rejoice, heavens, and you who dwell in them. Woe to those who live in the earth and of the sea, because the devil has gone down to you, having great wrath, knowing that he has but a short time.”

block.text: Buna görә dә, ey göylәr vә Orada mәskәn salanlar, bayram edin! Qurunun vә dәnizinsә vay halına! Çünki iblis böyük hiddәtlә yanınıza endi, Bilir ki, onun az vaxtı qalıb>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

block.text: Әjdaha yer üzünә atıldığını görәndә oğlan uşağı doğan qadının ardınca düşdü.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, that she might fly into the wilderness to her place, so that she might be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.

block.text: Amma qadına böyük qartalın iki qanadı verildi ki, çölә – öz yerinә uçsun vә orada, ilandan kәnarda bir vaxt, vaxtlar vә yarım vaxt әrzindә bәslәnsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The serpent spewed water out of his mouth after the woman like a river, that he might cause her to be carried away by the stream.

block.text: İlan qadının ardınca ağzından sel kimi su püskürdü ki, sel onu aparsın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The earth helped the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed up the river which the dragon spewed out of his mouth.

block.text: Lakin quru qadına kömәk etdi: quru ağzını açdı vә әjdahanın ağzından püskürdüyü seli içib qurtardı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The dragon grew angry with the woman, and went away to make war with the rest of her seed, who keep God’s commandments and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.

block.text: Onda әjdaha qadına qәzәblәndi, onun nәslindәn Allahın әmrlәrinә riayәt edәn vә İsa barәdә şәhadәt edәn başqaları ilә döyüşmәk üçün getdi
vә dәniz sahilinin qumları üzәrindә dayandı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 13
Then I stood on the sand of the sea. I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads. On his horns were ten crowns, and on his heads, blasphemous names.

block.text: Dәnizdәn çıxan on buynuzlu vә yeddi başlı bir vәhşi heyvan gördüm. Onun buynuzlarının üstündә on kiçik tac var idi, başlarının üzәrindә isә küfr olan adlar yazılmışdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were like those of a bear, and his mouth like the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave him his power, his throne, and great authority.

block.text: Gördüyüm vәhşi heyvan bәbirә oxşayırdı. Onun ayaqları ayı ayaqları kimi, ağzı da aslan ağzı kimi idi. Әjdaha ona öz gücünü, taxtını vә böyük sәlahiyyәt verdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: One of his heads looked like it had been wounded fatally. His fatal wound was healed, and the whole earth marveled at the beast.

block.text: Vәhşi heyvanın başlarından biri sanki ölümcül yaralanmışdı, ancaq o, ölümcül yarasından sağaldı. Bütün yer üzü heyrәt içindә vәhşi heyvanın ardınca getdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They worshiped the dragon, because he gave his authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast, saying,

block.text: Әjdahaya sәcdә etdilәr, çünki vәhşi heyvana sәlahiyyәt verәn o idi. Hәmçinin vәhşi heyvana sәcdә edib dedilәr:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Who is like the beast? Who is able to make war with him?”

block.text: <<Kim bu vәhşi heyvana tay ola vә onunla döyüşә bilәr?>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: A mouth speaking great things and blasphemy was given to him. Authority to make war for forty-two months was given to him.

block.text: Vәhşi heyvana lovğa vә küfr danışan bir ağız da verildi. Hәm dә ona sәlahiyyәtini qırx iki ay icra etmәk izni verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He opened his mouth for blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his dwelling, those who dwell in heaven.

block.text: O, ağzını açdı ki, Allaha küfr etsin, Onun adına, hәmçinin mәskәninә, yәni göydә mәskәn salanlara küfr söylәsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.

block.text: Ona izin verildi ki, müqәddәslәrlә döyüşüb onlara qalib gәlsin. Hәmçinin ona bütün tayfalar, xalqlar, dillәr vә millәtlәr üzәrindә sәlahiyyәt verildi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.

block.text: Kәsilmiş Quzunun hәyat kitabına dünya yaranandan bәri adı yazılanlardan savayı, yer üzündә yaşayanların hamısı ona sәcdә edәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone has an ear, let him hear.

block.text: Kimin qulağı var, qoy eşitsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed. Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.

block.text: Kim әsir olmalıdırsa, Әsirliyә gedir, Kim qılıncla öldürülmәlidirsә, Qılıncla öldürülür. Gәrәk müqәddәslәrin dözümü vә imanı olsun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.

block.text: Mәn yerdәn çıxan başqa bir vәhşi heyvan da gördüm. Onun quzu buynuzuna oxşayan iki buynuzu var idi, amma әjdaha kimi danışırdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.

block.text: O, birinci vәhşi heyvanın bütün sәlahiyyәtini onun önündә icra edir, yer üzünü vә orada yaşayanları ölümcül yarasından sağalan hәmin vәhşi heyvana sәcdә etmәyә mәcbur edir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He performs great signs, even making fire come down out of the sky to the earth in the sight of people.

block.text: İkinci vәhşi heyvan böyük әlamәtlәr göstәrir, hәtta insanların önündә göydәn yerә od yağdırır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He deceives my own people who dwell on the earth because of the signs he was granted to do in front of the beast; saying to those who dwell on the earth:

block.text: Birinci vәhşi heyvanın önündә göstәrilmәsinә izin verilmiş әlamәtlәrlә yer üzündә yaşayanları aldadaraq onlara deyir ki:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Make an image to the beast who was wounded by the sword and lived.”

block.text: "Edən qılınc və yaşamış ilə yaralanmışdır canavar bir image olun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: It was given to him to give breath to it, to the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause as many as wouldn’t worship the image of the beast to be killed.

block.text: Ona hәmin vәhşi heyvanın surәtinә nәfәs vermәk qüdrәti verildi ki, bu surәt dә danışsın vә ona sәcdә etmәyәn hәr kәsin öldürülmәsini әmr etsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads.

block.text: İkinci vәhşi heyvan hamını – böyüklәri vә kiçiklәri, varlıları vә yoxsulları, azadları vә qulları mәcbur edir ki, sağ әllәri yaxud alınları damğalansın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No one would be able to buy or to sell unless he has that mark, the name of the beast or the number of his name.

block.text: Belәcә bu damğanı, yәni hәmin vәhşi heyvanın adını ya da adını tәmsil edәn sayı daşımayan bir kәsә alıb-satmağa icazә verilmir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Here is wisdom. He who has understanding, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. His number is six hundred sixty-six.

block.text: Bu işdә müdrik olmaq lazımdır. Kimin ağlı var, qoy bu vәhşi heyvana mәxsus sayı hesablasın, çünki bu bir insanın sayıdır. Onun sayı altı yüz altmış altıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: REVELATION 14
I saw, and behold, the Lamb standing on Mount Zion, and with him a number, one hundred forty-four thousand, having his name, and the name of his Father, written on their foreheads.

block.text: Mәn gördüm ki, Quzu Sion dağında durub. Onunla birlikdә 144,000 nәfәr var idi. Onların alnında Quzunun adı vә Onun Atasının adı yazılmışdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard a sound from heaven, like the sound of many waters, and like the sound of a great thunder. The sound which I heard was like that of harpists playing on their harps.

block.text: Mәn göydәn gur suların sәdasına vә güclü göy gurultusuna bәnzәr bir sәs eşitdim. Eşitdiyim sәs çәng çalanların çәnglәrinin sәsi kimi idi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They sing a new song before the throne, and before the four living creatures and the elders. No one could learn the song except the one hundred forty-four thousand, those who had been redeemed out of the earth.

block.text: Onlar taxtın, dörd canlı mәxluqun vә ağsaqqalların önündә yeni bir nәğmә oxuyurlar. Yer üzündәn satın alınmış bu 144,000 nәfәrdәn başqa heç kәs bu nәğmәni öyrәnә bilmәdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: These are those who were not defiled with women, for they are virgins. These are those who follow the Lamb wherever he goes. These were redeemed by Jesus from among men, the first fruits to God and to the Lamb.

block.text: Bunlar özlәrini qadınlarla lәkәlәmәmiş şәxslәrdir, çünki bakirdirlәr. Quzu hara getsә, onlar da Onun ardınca gedir. Onlar Allah vә Quzu üçün nübar olaraq insanlar arasından satın alındı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In their mouth was found no lie, for they are blameless before the throne of God.

block.text: Ağızlarından heç vaxt yalan çıxmayıb, onlar lәkәsizdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I saw an angel flying in mid heaven, having an eternal Good News to proclaim to those who dwell on the earth, and to every nation, tribe, language, and people.

block.text: Mәn göyün ortasında uçan başqa bir mәlәk gördüm. O, yer üzündә yaşayanlara – hәr millәtә, hәr tayfaya, hәr dilә vә hәr xalqa yaymaq üçün әbәdi bir Müjdә gәtirirdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He said with a loud voice,

block.text: Mәlәk uca sәslә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Fear the Lord, and give him glory; for the hour of his judgment has come. Worship him who made the heaven, the earth, the sea, and the springs of waters!”

block.text: <<Allahdan qorxun, Ona izzәt verin! Çünki Onun mühakimә edәcәyi vaxt gәldi. Göyü, yeri, dәnizi vә su qaynaqlarını Yaradana sәcdә edin!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another, a second angel, followed, saying,

block.text: İkinci mәlәk dә onun ardınca gәlәrәk deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Babylon the great has fallen, which has made all the nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality.”

block.text: <<Dağıldı, böyük Babil dağıldı! O, әxlaqsızlığının coşğun şәrabını bütün millәtlәrә içirtmişdi>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Another angel, a third, followed them, saying with a great voice,

block.text: Bunların ardınca üçüncü bir mәlәk dә gәlәrәk uca sәslә deyirdi:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “If anyone worships the beast and his image, and receives a mark on his forehead, or on his hand,

block.text: <<Kim vәhşi heyvana vә onun surәtinә sәcdә edib öz alnının yaxud әlinin damğalanmasını qәbul edәrsә,

ReferenceBlocks.text: he also will drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is prepared unmixed in the cup of his anger. He will be tormented with fire and sulfur in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb.

block.text: o da Allahın qәzәb kasasına qarışıqsız tökülmüş coşğun şәrabından içәcәk. Belәlәrinә müqәddәs mәlәklәrin vә Quzunun önündә od vә kükürdlә işgәncә verilәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The smoke of their torment goes up forever and ever. They have no rest day and night, those who worship the beast and his image, and whoever receives the mark of his name.

block.text: Onlara verilәn işgәncәnin tüstüsü әbәdi olaraq qalxacaq. Vәhşi heyvana vә onun surәtinә sәcdә edib adına aid damğanı qәbul edәnlәr gecә-gündüz rahatlıq tapmayacaq>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This calls for patient endurance on the part of the saints, those who keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus.”

block.text: Allahın әmrlәrinә riayәt edәn vә İsaya imanına sadiq qalan müqәddәslәrin gәrәk dözümü olsun.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I heard the voice from heaven saying,

block.text: Onda göydәn belә deyәn bir sәs eşitdim:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Write, ‘Blessed are the dead who die in the Lord from now on.’”

block.text: <<Yaz: bundan sonra Rәbdә ölәnlәr nә bәxtiyardır!>>

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Yes,”

block.text: Bәli,

ReferenceBlocks.text: says the Spirit,

block.text: Ruh deyir:

ReferenceBlocks.text: “that they may rest from their labors; for their works follow with them.”
